In the Rhino application, routing can be introduced using
[`shiny.router` package](https://appsilon.github.io/shiny.router/).
A detailed tutorial on how to apply it in Rhino applications
can be found [here](https://appsilon.github.io/shiny.router/articles/rhino.html).
